title: FO-11: Foundation (Types, Agents, Seeds, Actions)
description:
## Scope

Creates the entire backend layer for FO-11: TypeScript types, discovery agent, affirmation agent, KV store seeds, server actions, and seed registration. After this epic, the discovery agent can generate adapted questions/chips/skip-signals, and the affirmation agent can generate affirmations from variable-length exchange arrays.

## Spec Reference

`docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/2026-02-11-fo-11-spec.md` — Sections: "Technical Architecture", "Discovery Agent", "KV Store Keys", "Exchange Structure"

## Key Files

- `app/fo-11/types.ts` — FO11DiscoveryResponse, FO11OnboardingData, step constants
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-11/discovery-agent.ts` — New discovery agent (question + chips + skip)
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-11/affirmation-agent.ts` — Based on FO-10 affirmation agent
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-11/index.ts` — Agent exports
- `src/db/seeds/fo-11.ts` — KV store seeds for both agents
- `src/db/seeds/index.ts` — Register fo-11 seeds
- `app/fo-11/actions.ts` — Server actions: generateDiscoveryStep(), generateAffirmationBatchFO11()

## Worker Instructions

- Complete tasks in order (they build on each other)
- Read `docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/implementation-notes.md` before starting
- Append your learnings to `docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/implementation-notes.md` when all tasks are done
- Use FO-10 as the primary reference implementation (`app/fo-10/`, `src/mastra/agents/fo-10/`, `src/db/seeds/fo-10.ts`)
- Check epic notes: `tk notes <this-epic-id>`
notes: 2026-02-11 15:05 - EPIC COMPLETE: Foundation layer done. Types (app/fo-11/types.ts), discovery agent + affirmation agent (src/mastra/agents/fo-11/), KV seeds (src/db/seeds/fo-11.ts registered in index.ts), and server actions (app/fo-11/actions.ts) all created. Key patterns: discovery agent namespace is fo-11-discovery, affirmation is fo-11-affirmation. generateDiscoveryStep(5|6, context) returns FO11DiscoveryResponse with skip signal. Step 6 has safety guard forcing skip=false. No familiarity passed to agents. All TypeScript checks and db:seed pass clean.
closed_reason: All 4 tasks completed: types, agents, seeds, server actions
